name: Benevolent Apparition
description: Exhibits positive emotional interaction, no threat posed.

name: Capricious Poltergeist
description: Demonstrates minor telekinetic activities, moving objects unaided.

name: Auditory Manifestation
description: Only detectable via sound waves, visual form unobservable.

name: Visual Apparition
description: Observable spectral manifestation, no physical interaction recorded.

name: Thermokinetic Entity
description: Detectable via sudden decrease in ambient temperature.

name: Tracking Specter
description: Displays consistent follow and observe behavior, inducing psychological distress.

name: Oneiric Apparition
description: Manifests during REM sleep, causing sleep disturbances.

name: Possessive Spirit
description: Exhibits ability to manipulate and control physical entities, including humans.

name: Retributive Phantom
description: Displays aggressive behavior, caused by perceived past wrongs.

name: Malevolent Entity
description: Exhibits high-level supernatural abilities, inducing extreme fear response.
